thread.section_title: The Westin Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JINITA P
title: Great location
text: I enjoyed my visit at this Westin thoroughly! The lobby and common areas smell divine! Its their white tea fragrance which you also can purchase from the spa! We had a stunning view from the room! We could see the Louvre,eiffel tower,Notre dam and the river! The breakfast was a bit disappointing! Very limited fresh hot selections for vegetarians! Not very prompt service! The concierge and front desk however were very courteous and friendly! Overall a good experience except for the breakfast!
